choices: I. Midoriya/K. Bakugo/D. Kaminari/E. Kirishima/T. Iida
1.content:
First off, we need to determine who grows first. It will only be one male at first before some of the other guys begin to grow. Or not. It's all up to you.
That being said I hope you all have fun exploring this interactive.
And if you see a chapter that hasn't been written yet, please feel free to do so.
So... pick a group of guys who has a growing candidate.
1.title: Welcome!

11.content: Okay, so which of these guys should grow? Hm?
11.title: I. Midoriya/K. Bakugo/D. Kaminari/E. Kirishima/...

info.brief_description: Enjoy as the guys from MHA begin to bulk up and grow!
info.description:
In this interactive tale, the different male characters from My Hero Academia will grow in muscle and even in other ways, to a lesser extent. It all depends on choice and what happens next.
This is rated 13+, only as a precaution. That being said, I hope you enjoy what you find!
